name: Asylum 626
description:
A horror adventure game that can only be played at night and is the sequel to Hotel 626.

You adventure through a dark and terrifying asylum to figure out what happened and how you got there. Solve puzzles and try to escape your situation unharmed while eating Doritos.

name: Abyssus Deep Under
description:
Theme:
Abyssus Deep Under transports players into an underwater world, where the mysteries of the deep ocean await exploration and conquest. The game’s setting combines the allure of the unknown with the strategic demands of resource management and territorial expansion.

Genre:
This game is a blend of 4X (explore, expand, exploit, exterminate) and Real-Time Strategy (RTS), offering a unique mix of long-term strategic planning and real-time tactical combat. Players manage resources, develop technologies, and engage in underwater battles.

Abyssus Deep Under offers a deep, immersive experience with a nostalgic touch, inspired by classic 90s 3D isometric graphics. The game is available on both PC and mobile platforms, ensuring accessibility for a wide range of players.

name: Fista Retro Horror Pack
description:
Travel back to the early days of the internet and play the slasher fan games that started it all! You play as Jason Voorhees, Michael Myers, Freddy Krueger & Candyman in these old-school games featuring MS Paint graphics and WAVs ripped from VHS tapes.

This is an all in one program that contains all 4 PC slasher fan games by Fista Productions.

name: Whiskerwood
description: Establish a home for your industrious mice under the oppressive paw of your cat overlords in this city builder featuring complex simulations, intricate production chains, and the age-old rivalry between cat and mouse.

name: A Candle to the Unknown
description: Sin descripción

name: Niraya of
description: "Niraya of " is a Japanese horror game inspired by the Buddhist beliefs. The game focuses on a unique system where players "avoid" the attacks of various monsters. This, combined with the fear of exploring eerie environments and solving puzzles, is a major draw of the game.

name: Slime Scramble
description: Become the ultimate slime! Eat green slimes to grow, dodge the red ones, and see how big you can get in this cozy yet challenging slime scramble!

name: A Walk in the Park
description: There is a fireworks event in the evening and your friend knows just the right place to watch it. All you have to do is get there through this perfectly normal park. Just follow the arrows and you'll reach your destination. Eventually. How hard can that be?

name: Harpoon Lagoon
description: Aim and skillfully shoot harpoons at the fish swimming by. Shoot the fish to get points, and catch the jellyfish that lives in the treasure chest to win the jackpot! Play by yourself or with up to 4 players.

name: Magic Circle
description: Play endless party games. Host party games for your friends and play for free! Coming soon to Discord activities.

name: Street Fighter 6: Return of Shadoloo
description: Sin descripción

name: Payout: Shop Simulator
description: Build and manage your shop, deliver physics-based products using Van, Forklift and Truck. Hire workers to speed up your progress

name: Merge Marbles
description: Merge Marbles is a relaxing puzzle game where your goal is to merge as many pairs of the same coloured marbles as you can. Each time you merge a pair it creates the next tier all the way up to the big pink marble. Try your best to merge the pink marble to clear as much space as you can!

name: Knight Lore
description: This version of the game extensively modifies the graphics and sounds. It is the only version of the game that has color graphics. While the original game took place in a dungeon, this version takes place in a forest.

name: Chelsea of the South Sea Islands
description: After being marooned on a deserted island, Chelsea has to fend for herself like Robinson Crusoe once did until her family rescues her.

name: Cave Girl Clair
description: You play as Clair, a girl who has to survive in the Stone Age.

name: Zaxxon
description:
A Port of Zaxxon for Atari 2600 and Intellivision.

This version of the game uses a third person perspective as opposed to the isometric view of the original arcade game.

name: Demon Attack
description: The Intellivision version changes up the graphics and adds a boss that was not present in the original game.

name: Due to Rain
description:
Oh, no! ️
Due to rain, Ribbon and Sarah missed out of their daily walk.
Though, they may have found another way to stay active inside.

name: Backpackers Guide to the Universe
description: Platformer which adds elements of puzzle solving to the mix.

name: Letter to a Landlord
description: A horror exploration game with great artwork and dark themes.

name: Elden Ring: Dark Moon
description: An overhaul focused on new content and fashion souls, based on Elden Ring: Shattered

name: Chained
description: You are chained to your friends and must climb to the top. One wrong move can decide your friendship.

name: Dungeon Beach
description: Cute and sexy seaside random dungeon action

name: The History of Magic Tower: Opening
description: "The History of Magic Tower: Opening" is a fantasy adventure game based on the "Magic Tower" game mode. This work is set against the backdrop of various traditional magical tower worldviews and tells the story of events that occurred before the time point of the classic game "50-layer Magic Tower".

name: This Company of Mine
description: In the urban workplace, you will hold great power and it's time to decide the fate of others. Eliminate those guys you don't like and hire those you like. This is a company that belongs to you!

name: Kioku Hanabi
description: Remember the color, location, and timing of the fireworks that were launched, and try to launch them in the same way. Although the rules are simple, it is deep and you will be drawn to the beautiful visuals.

name: Rangarok End Girls
description: Girls, resist the world and burn your lives! Full-voice stylish action!!

name: Ten Seconds Hero 1
description: Open world,RPG,Build,All Monster and NPC can be controlled.

name: Fushigi na Sekai no Kankou Nikki
description: This game is finding them and trying to clear the game. I can't give away any secrets, so I can't give you any detailed explanations. You'll just have to buy it! Tom: "But it's only available in Japanese language. Is there no English version?" "sorry. then I took an arrow in the knee... "

name: Do Not Look at the Moon
description: The moon, once serene, now portends doom. Air raid sirens blare, TVs warn: "Do not look at the moon." Your world's turned upside down. Messages flood in, all asking: How to survive in this world of bizarre rules?

name: Employee Rules of the Night Strings
description: This is a bartender simulation game. While mixing drinks that satisfy customers, you also need to carefully identify whether the guests in front of you are human or something similar to human.

name: My Ghost Pet is Zhong Kui
description: A real-time turn based MMORPG with auto chess,Unlimited learning skills, free combination,Exquisite pixel style image

name: Macabre no Zantou: Remnants of the Macabre
description: Navigate 1980s Japan as a schoolgirl in this Junji Ito-inspired horror game. Each choice shapes your fate, leading to safety or deeper into the macabre. Uncover hidden horrors in an urban street filled with sinister details. Will you find your way home, or be consumed by the unknown?

name: She From The Future
description: In a bizarre fire two years ago, Mei lost her detective boyfriend. And now she is also a detective, and her goal is to find out the real cause of her boyfriend's death. And with her life in the detective agency, she is hooked up with the mysterious power that travels through time and space......

name: Dwelling
description: In "Dwelling," a police officer investigates terrifying events in an abandoned school. Uncover the truth, survive the horrors, and solve the mystery hidden within each floor.

name: Dino Tribe: New Era
description: Create your dino chief, lead your tribe. Survive waves of enemies, explore and settle on foreign islands. Find a way to avoid extinction!

name: Jumper, Jumpy Time Attack Adventure
description: Jumper is a 2D platformer arcade style, the goal is to stay alive as long as possible, jump on as many platforms as possible but be careful for traps ! As the score is increasing so is the difficulty and the speed.

name: Private Mining Company
description: Private Mining Company is a tower defense game with perma-death and extraction elements. Keep your soldiers while you complete contracts, as long as they aren't killed. Make money defending mining outposts on hostile alien planets. Balance mining upgrades and growing your army.

name: Nucleuz Underground
description: The planet is dying, a team has been created that has to go underground, in the exile of the machines and hit the core. Only in this way, humanity will be able to survive and we have the mission to do so every day. A classic 2D platform game, in a dystopian and survival future. Join the team. Now.

name: Field of the Dead
description: Field of the Dead is a post-apocalyptic sci-fi horror game where you battle undead and mutants with space weapons. Level up, fight bosses, acquire rare gear, and explore infested areas to uncover the apocalypse's secrets. Supports single-player and up to four-player multiplayer.

name: Herta's Chess Game
description: Herta's simulated universe network is interconnected throughout the universe. Pack your luggage and enter Herta's world with your friends. In this fan game, you will use the simulation data of each original character to have a strategic showdown with Herta.

name: Carpe Noctem
description: A yuri visual novel about a vampiress and a monster hunter falling in love in Victorian England.

name: Flappy Horse
description: This is a game where you guide this crazy looking horse through hurdles to try and gain the best score you can! As you Flap through the game you collect sugar cubes which you use in the shop to buy upgrades to get even better scores an even more sugar cubes.

name: Floors
description: Embark on a procedural liminal journey filled with eerie, unfriendly faces. Walk, explore, and descend to the first floor to escape. No monsters will chase you, but they can watch and appear when you aren't looking. This can evoke a fear of an endless labyrinth and create a sense of anxiety.

name: Duck Run
description: Duck Run is an exhilarating 2D precision platformer that will test your reflexes and agility.

name: OBJ VR
description: An educational VR game that takes players into realistic school emergency scenarios. The game includes various scenarios such as fires, earthquakes and chemical accidents that require quick and effective response.

name: Mini-Market Simulator VR
description: Run your own mini-market, starting from a humble corner shop and growing into a bustling retail hub. Stock shelves, assist customers, and manage your store in an immersive VR environment.

name: Dorf the Dwarf
description: Dorf the dwarf is a puzzle game which replicates the classic game Zeek the Geek. You play as Dorf, a dwarf adventuer, who dares into the dungeons of Koganusân , ruins of a dwarf fortress, to loot treasures, while avoiding ghosts, elephants and deadly traps, and solving puzzles.

name: Oh, honey! Anime clicker!
description: Welcome to Oh, Honey! Anime Clicker!, a simple clicker game set in a delightful anime-style! In this game, you'll tap to accumulate points.

name: Gears Unchained: The Rise of Revolution
description: In a futuristic city under dictatorship, a brave mechanic with an illegal electronic arm rises up against the dictator. Face dangers, unravel intrigues and overcome deadly obstacles, approaching an epic final showdown.

name: Find Colibries
description: Test your attentiveness in the captivating world of Aztec jungles in the game Find Colibries and find all the hidden birds!

name: Mushroom
description: Mushroom is a clicker game. You will see the visions after eating poisonous mushrooms. You will get a mushroom every x hours. Collect more to win the world.

name: Dice Dice Dice
description: This is a casual deck-building game based on dice rolling. Players will rely on their choices and some luck to achieve victory.

name: Laser Sounds
description: You are a mercenary hired by the Space Company to inspect the space station, which has not been heard from for years, because of the news you have received that some experiments are being carried out. Your goal is to clear everyone from this space station.

name: Simulation: Catalyst
description: In this game you can enjoy a semi-causal 2d platformer while fully immersing yourself in a 3d parallax environment.

name: Apple
description: How do you like them apples? Because we have them all! Have time in the game or click the apple to get your favorite apple.

name: Toilet
description: A casual puzzle game. Go to the toilet, one must also strategize.

name: Red Nose Guy The LegenDairy Quest
description: Red Nose Guy: The LegenDairy Quest is a modern and high-energy revisit of an arcade classic.Join Red Nose Guy on an adventure through the city's various neighborhoods and discover his colorful and absurd universe!

name: Links Quartz
description: A turn-based RPG with mysterious graphics in which dot-picture characters move through 3D space. Use the “Shift” command to change the character's standing position to gain an advantage in the battle.

name: Young Detectives: Holidays
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Poodle Clicker
description: Free to Play Poodle Clicker is a game full of stylish Poodles and original Music, mostly melodic metal songs, but there are more!

name: Colo Moon
description: This game is a highly difficult mountain climbing physics action game. All you need to do is one click and force roll.

name: Suppress Academician
description: An innovative game combining simulation management, auto chess, and strategy competition. Rebuild an ancient academy, recruit and train students. Utilize the Ban & Pick mechanism and resource management. The open creative workshop offers rich strategy and interactive experiences.

name: Cheese Collector
description: Cheese Collector is a fun and addictive clicker game where you collect a variety of cheeses! Click to gather cheese and expand your cheesy collection. Every 150 minutes, you'll receive a unique cheese to add to your stash.

name: Graphwar II
description: Graphwar II is an artillery game in which you must hit your enemies using mathematical functions. The trajectory of your shot is determined by the function you wrote, and your goal is to avoid the obstacles and your teammates and hit your enemies. The game takes place in a Cartesian Plane.

name: Top-G: Battle of The Matrix
description: Experience the intense action of a Romanian Mafia Boss in this gripping action-adventure game. Fight the government, police, and elites after being stripped of all your power and wealth. Sail the seas, drive through mountains, fly in the sky, and break into top-secret labs to beat the Matrix.

name: Exodus: The Rise of Chaos
description: You wake up trapped in your own mind, a mental prison filled with fears and distorted memories. To survive and understand the true nature of a Global Apocalypse, you must first confront the inner demons that haunt you.

name: Restless Nights
description: The Shadow Stalker is out to get you, but why? Try to fall asleep while fixing anomalies around the house and keeping the fireplace lit in this horror experience as you uncover the truth of why your being haunted. How long can you survive?

name: Prime Agents
description: A first person shooter entangled with magic.

name: Elementalist
description: In this movement puzzle platformer, you have to collect your abilities before using them. Jump, dash, dive, and teleport inside carefully crafted levels, to salvage as many sun fragments as possible.

name: Glitch of The Game
description: A small indie rpg/puzzle game where you will need to figure out various glitches and exploits in order to defeat The Big Bad.

name: Highway Hijinks
description: Highway Hijinks is a roguelike endless runner that takes place in a futuristic post-apocalyptic world controlled by a mysterious artificial intelligence. Discover wacky items, race against computer opponents, and upgrade your vehicle with powerful gadgets to get as far as you can.

name: Bass Defense: First Memorythms
description: In Bass Defense's rhythm-based and action-packed 'Soundwave' game mode, you must hit the correct buttons in time with the music to clear your NMYs and save your base with the help of your upgradable power-ups or your sense of rhythm. Try your luck and 5 memorythms in this free episode.

name: Pixel Parkour
description: Fast, fluid movement is at the core of this vibrant indie adventure. Blast through beautiful landscapes and complete speed challenges to find your purpose in this picturesque, pixelated world.

name: Hidden Cats Invade Venice
description: Hidden Cats Invade Venice is a hidden object game, where you have to find 400 cute little kittens hidden in the magnificent city of Venice in 3D. A peaceful, colorful game for all ages.

name: Extreme Climbing Mirage City
description: Explore exciting climbing tracks in the Baghdad desert with assassin characters in Extreme Climbing Mirage City! This game, full of realistic graphics and challenging missions, increases the adrenaline rush. Start climbing now and write your legend!

name: Wasted Shot
description: Wasted Shot is a open world VR game inspired by GTA. It features in game shops, pedestrians, cars, weapons, a customizable character, physics based gameplay and more.

name: A Dwarves Day
description: A Dwarves Day is a 2D adventure game with platformer-style gameplay. You play as a dwarf who finds himself tricked by greed into tumbling down a treacherous hole by a pesky goblin. You must delve deep in search of a way out and get back to that gold! Just a typical day in the life of a dwarf.

name: Scrambled Eggs
description: "Why did the chicken cross the road? It didn't." Try to stop the chicken hordes with vehicular combat. Compete for high scores against your friends.

name: The Simple Climb Game
description: This is a game where you climb by jumping, sprinting, and slowing, while being careful not to fall. The only thing you can do to escape from a world where one day suddenly no one is left is to climb. If you keep climbing without giving up, you will definitely be able to escape.

name: Crossbow Quest
description: Whether you're a seasoned gamer looking for a new challenge or someone seeking a relaxing yet engaging experience, Cross Bow Quest promises to deliver an unforgettable adventure. Sharpen your skills, find your zen, and take on the quest of a lifetime.

name: Before the End
description: In this game you play as an experienced paranormal investigator. On the way you will need to look for keys from the doors, notes from the staff and those who studied here.

name: The Human Snake
description: The Human Centipede meets The nokia classic snake in this 1980s retro inspired game entitled THE HUMAN SNAKE!!!

name: Life Codex
description: Life Codex is a journey of solitude within the pages of a book. Solve intricate puzzles to uncover the narrative. Step inside my temple, find opus on the table. To understand it all, I'll leave you just a label. Undress your bones - dance skeleton. And then you will know, what's the Point of it all.

name: Dog
description: The ultimate idle clicker game! Tap to collect adorable pups, upgrade your canine companions, and build a thriving dog park empire. Earn tradable Steam items every 60 minutes of play. Join thousands in this free, paw-some adventure. Start your doggy journey now!

name: Weekdays
description: Black-and-White Style: Immerse yourself in a unique atmosphere where light and shadow play a crucial role.Variety of Locations: Explore strange corridors with rooms, a forest with a witch's hut, an old cemetery, an abandoned house on a wasteland, and more.

name: Ninja Kato 4
description: 2D Action Game! Robot Ninja Kato's training has entered the final stages! Control the robot ninja Kato and train him to become a full-fledged ninja.

name: Find Me
description: This is a 2D flatformer game where you go on an adventure to regain your body, and you arrive at your destination through various sections. Lots of prepared obstacles, traps, and tricks. I hope you reach your destination with all your detailed manipulation, memory, persistence, and luck.

name: Wurzelnsisters
description: Cute Shooting Game: Drive Away the Goblins Attacking the Town with Modern Firearms!

name: Slack Off Master
description: A shooting class casual small game. When you are sleeping at work, other people will approach you. So you have to fire through the control of the cannon to control others to get close to you. When you make it to the end, you will be awarded the Master Fish Medal.

name: Money and Lady
description: "Money & Lady" is a party game that requires luck & management strategy! Haa! This is also the gentlemen's favorite game, the game won the New Earth Best Happiness Award and Not Tired to Replay Award! Support up to 4 players, and 7 different heroines is waiting for you...

name: Descendant
description: Descendant is a 2D dungeon exploration game with roguelite elements and turn-based RPG combat. Controlling a team of 4 characters, the player explores a mysterious cave filled with dangerous enemies, mystical locations and unclaimed treasure.

name: Dungeon Diver
description: An arcade-like maze crawler full of treasures and traps!

name: Football Squad
description: The great world football event is being held. What no one counted on was that the world would suffer the alien invasion and the machine revolution at that time. Only the most skilled footballers will be able to stop this. Destroy any alien bug that crosses your path with balls. 1 or 2 players.

name: Co-Op Crunch
description: A third person 3D take on an 80's iconic maze chasing game that you can play by yourself or play online with up to three other players. Multiple challenging levels which explore many ways to test your, or your team's collaborative, or competitive, skills. Paku paku!

name: Gun Crate Raccoon
description: Gun Crate Raccoon is a fast-paced arcade platformer where you collect crates to skyrocket your highscore and conquer the leaderboard. Climb higher and unfold the mysteries of the Tower.

name: Ashes of Idunn: Tales of Fimbulwinter
description: Ashes Of Idunn: Tales Of Fimbulwinter is a small sneak peek into the future of the Ashes Of Idunn Metaverse. In this experience, you will follow the Berserker into battle in search of his people. After the fight with the Troll, the Berserker seeks the Voelver to get answers.

name: Run Run My Bride!
description: This is a parkour game where players need to control the bride and groom in a race, dodging vehicles and obstacles along the way, while collecting plenty of hearts.

name: Waking Nitemare
description: Waking Nitemare: A newtro FPS with modern twists. Dash, heal with melee headshots, use bullet time. Face unique bosses, find upgrades. Classic shooter action meets innovative mechanics. For retro fans and newcomers alike.

name: Emoji Clicker
description: Get ready to dive into the colorful world of emojis like never before! In Emoji Clicker, your mission is simple: collect, upgrade, and dominate with the most diverse and powerful collection of emojis!

name: Seiden
description: A sci-fi RPG adventure. Start in modern times and explore infected areas on Earth. Travel back in time and annihilate the void. Numerous monsters and dungeons await you.

name: Block Tower TD 2
description: Block Tower TD 2 is a strategic game in the roguelike style with original innovations. Build worlds from blocks, choose random upgrades, each game will be unique.

name: Frog
description: Frog is a clicker Game, in which you click a Frog! In Frog you click the Frog to gain even more Frogs! Every 2 hours, you get dropped a new Frog. Frogs is also made by the community in discord. Come hang out with us and let's grow into something awesome !

name: Vampirii
description: Prowl homes, explore neighborhoods, overcome random encounters, reveal dark secrets, and make difficult choices as a newly-risen vampire in this text-heavy visual novel. Make friends and enemies while surviving this new life in which one night you are the predator, another - the prey.

name: Madam of Malice
description: Dare to play a roguelike deckbuilder card game with the Madam? Find out about the thief girl who brakes into the wrong manor. Experience her horror story: hiding from killers, crawling, evading attacks, stealing valuable items and… hopefully getting out alive. She, and you as well.

name: Head Collector VR
description: Head Collector VR is a thrilling action game where spells are full of power, and stunning characters feel alive. You can customize everything to suit your style, even bringing in your favorite characters using XNALara and Vroid models, making each battle totally unique.

name: Silent: Abandoned
description: Silent:Abandoned is a first-person psychological horror game. There are two brothers. They are vloggers. Michael And John. who love to vlog abandoned places. One night they go to an abandoned house.

name: SimuLove! vol. 1
description: As a young programmer, you're developing "SimuLOVE" with the help of your new hire, Alice. Balance work and your relationship with Jess, your girlfriend. Make choices that shape relationships and uncover secret endings in this choice-driven dating simulator.

name: Another Hope
description: Trapped in a doorless room, you must follow the commands given to you. This psychological horror experience will test your resolve and sanity. Can you escape, or will you remain imprisoned forever?

name: High Up
description: A mysterious platformer full of adventure!

name: Blightwreck
description: Stuck at the bottom of the sea floor, escape a sunken ocean liner in this handcrafted 2D Metroidvania! Find powerful upgrades, and fight strange bosses. You may be isolated from your shipmates, but you're not alone...

name: Sunny Side Crossing
description: A story-rich restaurant sim with slice-of-life RPG elements. Play as a newlywed couple inheriting a restaurant. Share duties with your spouse, from sourcing ingredients to managing the restaurant. Explore the world of Sunny Side Crossing through interactions with neighbors and customers.

name: Pixel Race Maker
description: Create your own unique levels or simply play one of our user crreated levels to earn badges and achievements.

name: Mall Manager Simulator
description: Join the "Mall Manager Simulator" community and start your journey to retail greatness today! Ready to create the mall of your dreams? Download now and let the management fun begin!

name: Card Summoner
description: Card Summoner is a CCG, where you journey to various villages and engage in local clan tournaments to elevate your rank. Duel villagers and collect unique cards while fulfilling your summoner duties by battling monsters in the void dungeons.

name: Mushiverse: Online Boardgame
description: Mushiverse is an online board game that can be played with 4-6 friends. • It offers a unique experience with its diverse mechanics. • Each player starts the game with unique characters and aims to reach the targeted number of flags by navigating various risks and luck factors.

name: Darok
description: Darok is a simple 2d platformer where you have to navigate Darok back home. There are breakable floors, moving platforms and Geysers to help Darok on his journey home.

name: CuckTales
description: CuckTales is a 2D Hand-Drawn Adult Visual Novel that takes you on an emotional and thrilling adventure. Explore the provocative world of the Cuckold/NTR fetish with a fresh twist, enriched by carefully curated bisexual moments and define your path to become the ultimate boyfriend.

name: I Commissioned Some Ladybugs 4
description: I paid more artists to hide ladybugs and aphids in 20 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Kiwi'n
description: Kiwi'n is a clicker Game, in which you click a Kiwi! In Kiwi you click the Kiwi to gain even more Kiwis! Come hang out with us and let's grow into something awesome !

name: (Neg)Entropic Wandering
description: (Neg)Entropic Wandering is a short visual novel for Insomniacs. Wander through the depths of space to empty your mind and finally get some sleep.

name: Village Cult
description: The events take place in a Soviet forest village located far from civilization. The main character inherits a house. Soon the hero learns that the entire village is part of a cult. Those who sacrifice people and engage in cannibalism. The hero has to get out of the village. But can he?

name: Footage
description: FOOTAGE is a short bodycam shooter styled game witch uses unreal engine 5 latest technology to get stunning graphics and amazing gameplay. FOOTAGE has lot of action packed moments with multiple levels with different difficulty's to help make the game a longer and a more fun experience.

name: The Playful Triangle
description: Each encounter with these "angry squares" pushes you to use your intellect and strategic thinking to evade danger and stay one step ahead.

name: Fruits & Vegetables
description: Fruits & Vegetables is a clicker game. You can merge fruits and vegetables to get new ones!

name: God Crafter
description: God Crafter is a casual and satisfying 3D clicker game where you, as a god, get to recreate Earth for the humans you create. Shape and design the world with your divine powers. Immerse yourself in a relaxing and rewarding gameplay experience as you build a beautiful and thriving world from scratch.

name: Dice
description:
Dice is a game where you click on a die to make a number increase.

Leave the game idle to collect adorable dice in your Steam inventory!

name: Mass Conflict: Ignition
description: Mass Conflict: Ignition offers a modernized classic RTS experience, inviting you to a battlefield filled with unique mechanics. Fight for power and resources in the midst of a global war!

name: Deathpuddle: Choose Violence?
description: Enter the chaotic, not-so-superhero world of Deathpuddle: Choose Violence? Guide Deathpuddle through epic and absurd missions filled with dark humor, bizarre characters, and unpredictable outcomes. Can you help Deathpuddle survive and clear his name, or will he always end up back in jail?

name: Engraven
description: Engraven is a single player sci-fi real time tactics game. Build and customize your regiment of soldiers and fight endless hordes of sorcerers and graven thralls.

name: The Whittled Horse
description: A boy named Thomas and his friend Evey are trusted to deliver a package. Little do they know there is a force stalking them, and what they carry will decide the future.

name: SIM: Simple Idle Miner
description: Gather resources to help the "important persons" to escape from the planet. A small and simple clicker game. Some would call it an idler. But how idle can you get, clicking all these upgrades. Also the fox doesn't want you to idle. Go get to work!

name: Star System Battle
description: Traverse a vast and mysterious universe, where every corner holds potential dangers and unforeseen challenges.

name: Vox Populi: USA 2024
description: Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for many alternative US elections! In "Vox Populi: USA 2024", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: Retro Ball
description: Enter the world of Retro Ball, a whimsical blend of past nostalgia and futuristic fun!

name: VHS
description: VHS, the most retro and nostalgic Idle game!

name: Roll The Die: Prologue
description: Pack your bag with good tools, modify your character's dice, and reach the end of the story.

name: Survival in Draconia
description: Survival in Draconia is a femdom 2D Fantasy RPG set in a continent where dominant women reign supreme. Navigate a harsh landscape, manage your resources, and find your place in a society where survival is anything but guaranteed.

name: Master Lemon: The Quest for Iceland
description: MASTER LEMON is a narrative adventure game inspired by a true story. Players solve puzzles and face challenges on a journey where freedom and dreams clash with tough choices. Join Lemon as he seeks to save a distant land from a memory-eating plague threatening world history and languages.

name: Peasant
description: Explore a beautiful medieval fantasy open world and defend your base against the so-called-heroes in this single player 3rd-person action RPG. Your choices create a dynamic experience in every playthrough!

name: Lootbawx
description: Collect and trade unique items by opening a LOOTBAWX! You'll be occasionally awarded loot boxes that are free to open; new loot boxes will be released frequently and sometimes even by our own community. Join our discord where you can contribute and have some fun.

name: Overthrown
description: Lift and throw anything as you build and manage your kingdom in this chaotic city builder for 1-6 players. Harness the power of your soul-stealing crown to defend your citizens from bandits and mutants, farm the land, and gather resources. Keep citizens happy or see them desert you!

name: Decipher the Deck
description: Decipher The Deck is a rule discovery puzzle game that turns traditional playing cards into interesting puzzle mechanics. Discover the secrets of cards, their abilities, and much more in 70 hand-crafted levels.

name: Hentai Breeding Simulator
description: Enter to unlock beautiful hentai girls, all fertile and ready to be bred!

name: Adventure Forest: Rabbit Story
description: Embark on a fascinating open-world adventure in Adventure Forest: Rabbit Story! Filled with realistic rabbits, this game offers unforgettable moments full of exploration, customization and survival. Solve the mysteries of the forest with your hero rabbit and embark on an adventure!

name: Fable Grove
description: Experience the addictive joy of a chilled, pixel clicker game where capturing different monsters in varied weather feels as fun as popping bubble wrap. Level up by clicking monsters or passively over time, increasing your chance to encounter rare Shinys that reward you with Steam Marketplace items.

name: Targeted: -10 Days
description: Can you survive 10 days in this anomaly-finding game? Stay vigilant, because YOU ARE THE TARGET!

name: Lust Galaxy
description: Immerse yourself in the cosmic passions of Lust Galaxy, an adult visual novel that opens the doors to a world of intrigue and danger.

name: Treasure Protector
description: In this game, you play as a dragon defending your treasure by burning, freezing, poisoning, and shocking knights, archers, and thieves. Combine elemental powers for powerful effects, raise dragons and set traps in this turn-based strategy.

name: Click On Cups Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ cups in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Hard

name: Crash-Land Fantasy
description: A mysterious magic force knocks your research satellite out of orbit. You crash land and you and your android captain must try to survive on this planet ruled by nature and figure out a way to get home while discovering what caused the force along the way.

name: Block Siege VR
description: Build your world and defenses in this unique and dynamic VR action-survival building game. Players can choose to casually build and save their own worlds or fight waves of robots in their world or in one of the unique environments. Players can utilize blocks and weapons to fight off waves of robots.

name: Gods of Fire
description: Engage in fierce conflicts with up to 6 players to compete for dominance over the Dragons Valley. Control your dragon, unleash fiery breath, launch fireballs, and use unique perks to dominate the battlefield.

name: MegaMegaEggs
description: Ghosts 'n Goblins × Mega Man × FallGuys!? Eggventure: No need for cooperation in A 2D Platform PvPvE Neo Retro Action Game! Aim for the Main Dish! Difficulty ★★★☆☆

name: Little Weasel
description: It is night and the Little Weasel has taken it upon themselves to check on all the pets in the city. With the help of the moon, players explore a free roaming city with cool mechanics to climb all over buildings and check on pets.

name: Spellbound: A Detective's Tale
description: Spellbound a detective´s tale is a Vr Noir/ Medieval fantasy inspired scape room in wich every time you start a new game every puzzle is randomized making every playthrough unique. Use All of your tools to scape the infinite tower.

name: Rusted Awakening
description: A gothic horror shooter set in a rusted industrial nightmare. Inspired by John Romero, David Lynch, and Doom 64.

name: Shinobi
description: Sin descripción

name: Business Empire Tycoon
description: Start your new Business and grow it into an Empire and become the next Tycoon!

name: Banana-Shaped
description: Banana-Shape is a clicker Game, in which you click on the banana shape!Win random banana shapes and grow your collection! Come hang out with us and let's become the kings of banana shapes!

name: Haunted Property
description: It is a psychological horror game and walking simulator. Explore a haunted apartment. Monsters jumping towards at your screen.

name: Argonauts Path
description: A card-based combat roguelike. A fantastic adventure of growth and struggle for the future of humanity. You will help in different villages, fight against incredible creatures and fearsome demons until you reach the 7 divine ones and you will fight against them, if you are up to it.

name: Treasure Hunter
description: Treasure Hunter is a multigame collector and crafting game in which you can obtain items on different ways and craft or exchange them for others.

name: Labyrinth: Roll of Fate
description: Trapped by a sinister Game Master, your only hope of escape is to play his twisted game. Blending first-person horror with turn-based strategy and inspired by classic board games, each turn, you roll the dice to determine your fate. But beware, the Game Master ensures no two games are ever the same.

name: Fruit of Choice
description: Casual arcade game. Stay on the move and survive for a long time. Dash to dodge, attack, and explode bombs!

name: Particle
description: A minimalist procedurally generated roguelike bullet-hell where you play as a microscopic robot fending off a bio-mechanical plague.

name: Defenders
description: Face endless waves of monsters in Defenders, a thrilling roguelike game. Use WASD to move and the mouse to attack, battling basic monsters, elites, and bosses. Level up your character after each wave to enhance your abilities and survive the onslaught.

name: Park the Retro Car
description: "Park the Retro Car" is a challenging and exciting game that puts your parking skills to the test.

name: Plungeez
description: Take a dive in the world of Plungeez, a puzzle platformer where Bonnie, a fierce woman who, after falling in the underground, must explore the sewers of Salvador in search of a way out. Light torches, boilers, and use plungers to climb and solve puzzles!

name: Backspace Backspace Backspace
description: In an AI-powered age where original authors have become largely redundant, play as a dejected writer on the brink of losing their creative drive forever.

name: Magical Merge: Fairy Adventure
description: Welcome to the enchanting world of "Magical Merge Fairy Adventure," where every turn is a new discovery in the art of magical cuisine. Join Rosie, a young and spirited girl, and her beloved granny-witch on an extraordinary journey through realms woven with fairy tales and culinary wonders.

name: The Back
description: 《Back》is a full-motion audio live horror game. Special Note 1: This game is very supernatural and scary, timid or heart disease players do not buy！！！！ The game will reveal different ending plots step by step through various searches and choices for your character.

name: Jewel Match: Solitaire Seasons - Collector's Edition
description: For everything there is a season, and for every season there's Solitaire! Play more than 1000 levels across 10 locations in any season. Be sure to participate in the best Solitaire experience of this season and last. Shuffle your cards to victory with Jewel Match Solitaire Seasons!

name: Tower Monster Rush
description: A tower defense game with brand new gameplay elements, innovatively combining the strategic tower defense with card battles.

name: The Neighbor: Escape Room
description: Do you dare to discover the secrets hidden behind the next door? "The Neighbor" will immerse you in a thrilling adventure filled with mystery and suspense. Set in a haunting house, your mission is to unravel its dark secrets before it's too late.

name: Legend of Parry King
description: Legend of Parry King is an action-packed boss-rush game inspired by the combat of Sekiro. Explore the beautiful eastern lands and face off against corrupted demons, defeating them through skillful parrying and dodging, without causing them harm.

name: Green Ogre Gives You Terrible Life Advice and Dies
description: Enter the swamp and meet green ogre who will guide you through some of the struggles of life by giving you some God tier advice.

name: Knightly Gnomes
description: Knightly Gnomes is a Top-Down Strategy game where you choose to play as either the leader of the Knights or Gnomes and control troops in order to fight the enemy faction.

name: Unko Technica
description: Enjoy the retro neon style graphics and cool sounds of this stylish UNKO action game as you guide the automatically running UNKO to the goal of the toilet by making it jump.

name: Seventh Song
description: Step into the role of a master strategist and manage a diverse group of adventurers. Send them on perilous expeditions to uncover ancient secrets, battle fearsome creatures, and retrieve legendary treasures.

name: Airport X-Ray Simulator
description: Step into the critical role of a baggage security operative in Airport X-Ray Simulator. As part of the backbone of airport security, you are the last line of defense against prohibited or illegal items making their way onto an aircraft or into the airport.

name: Yellow House
description: Yellow House is a non-linear visual horror novel. Dive into the grim atmosphere of a twisted mind surrounded by false and cruelty.

name: Elementyle
description: Elementyle is a chess-like, turn-based strategy game where players claim tiles with unique pieces and element sets.

name: Catastrophic Cat Command
description: Command thousands of cats on their journey to find a new home! Catastrophic Cat Command is an arcade-style game where you manage multiple mini-games at once! It’s the perfect game for a quick 5-minute break from work!

name: Sorrow Asylum 3
description: Sorrow Asylum 3 is a looping horror game, a mix of an abandoned asylum and your mind's prison.

name: Cat
description: Cat is a fun little clicker game where you can rest and click some cats. You can earn 2 drops to your inventory every 4h

name: Lost Tribe
description: Go on a dangerous journey to save your tribe! An unknown foe has turned the once peaceful island into chaos. With the help of an ancient guardian, you must uncover secrets, gain new abilities, and restore peace.

name: Ari Buktu and the Anytime Elevator
description: Ari Buktu is a vibrant and thrilling story-rich 2.5D puzzle-platformer inspired by 80s adventures. Join the eccentric professor, playing as his unwitting student, Ari, on a cinematic time travel treasure hunt through history, filled with daring escapes and era-hopping chases.

name: Another Day with You
description: You have a date to make! But, it looks like you got there too early... Explore this quiet corner of a bustling city by talking with locals, playing at the arcade, fishing, and much more. Don't forget your date - you'll have to swoon them with your impressive charisma. It's Another Day with You.

name: Chase the Gangsters
description: It seems that the law no longer works in the city. A super cop is needed!

name: Force of Numbers
description: Live streaming game "Force of Numbers" Live stream Force of Numbers and play with your viewers!*This game is a viewer-participation game for video streamers.

name: ESports Simulator
description: ESports Simulator is a simulation game where you can create and manage your own esports team.

name: Five-element Seal: Infinity
description: Representing the world of hell; A world that can shuttle through space, a world that can rotate continents... In the future, there will be more worlds and levels waiting to be explored, representing a world of creation where one can create their own world

name: Cosminers
description: Start your career as a cosmic miner! During the day, mine raw materials, create new tools and lethal weapons. Build up your base to survive the night attacks of rampaging monsters. Protect yourself, gain wealth and fly away in a rocket, or turn your outpost into an impregnable fortress!

name: Swamped!
description: Discover a Tower Defense as cute as it is addictive. Collect funny hats, magical equipment, and special powers to create the ultimate defense build. Explore an enchanted world filled with charming characters and challenges to overcome!

name: Carnival of Souls
description: Embark on Carnival of Souls, a first-person roguelite shooter where strategic weapon choices and upgrades are key to uncovering chilling secrets across otherworldly dimensions.

name: O.W.L Projekt
description: O.W.L Projekt is a 3D isometric puzzle game that will test your mind and logic skills. Controlling Elysion, a young being created in a mysterious experiment, you will face the enigmatic Watchers in a journey to escape and uncover secrets.

name: Kiki
description: Kiki, is a single player story driven action adventure game with survival elements where you will control Kiki as she goes into a journey to save her village from years of curse in a fantastic world.

name: Twisted to the Roots
description: Your loyal customer need your help. Take care of her backyard. Uncover some secrets while you're at it.

name: The Merry Fairy
description: The Merry Fairy is a cozy idle game where you collect beautiful decorations and create your scrapbook journal in a fairytale environment. Invite the enchanted Fairyland vibe into your life and discover your magic through the stories of Fairy and her friends!

name: Ice Run
description: Your fast-paced penguin adventure.

name: Shooting Range Simulator
description: Run your dream Shooting Range shop. Manage your supplies, rent guns and sell ammos which suits guns calibre. Modify your guns as you like. Expand and upgrade your shop, level up your popularity to get even better equipments. Join shooting tournaments or shoot your guns in your own range.

name: Fragile Reflection
description: Coming back home went completely wrong: village got twisted by Noh masks and Reflection is piercing into our reality…. Find items, solve puzzles, fight monsters and traverse between dimensions - Help Kario Ito reveal hidden mysteries and stay alive in this retro-styled survival horror!

name: Color of My Sound: Volume 1
description: Color of My Sound is an enthralling visual novel that combines elements of science fiction, espionage, drama, and eroticism. Immerse yourself in a captivating mystery as you navigate through the intricate web of character agendas, ambitions, and personal struggles.

name: Deep Inside
description: Deep Inside is a first-person psychological horror game! You are a police officer who has to find out who is behind the most high-profile murders in the city. Use your detective skills to catch the killer, but remember that the truth can be bitter!

name: Reconciliation
description: Psychological horror where you play as a young high schooler seeking reconciliation with an old friend. Unfortunately it won't be so easy, a perilous journey awaits you before you'll be able to reunite as friends once again.

name: Bopp File
description: "Bopp Files" is a spot-the-difference game that combines the elements of room escape, similar to "Exit No.8". In 1998, you wake up from the apartment with a loss of memory. A demon who claims to be an "Exile" blocks your apartment, demanding you to escape within the stipulated time, otherwise, you will face certain death. But will the demon really keep his promise? What is the demon's purpose after all?

name: Bass Defense
description: Bass Defense combines musical rhythm-based gameplay with strategic elements. You must hit the correct buttons in time with the music to clear your NMYs who try to destroy your base, unless you save it with the help of your upgradable - defensive or offensive - power-ups or your sense of rhythm.

name: Battleship Avalon
description: Rebuild the remnants of humanity and conquer the Milky Way in this strategy game. Colonize systems and corner markets, or lead your fleets to victory in real-time battles. Reclaim Earth, or terraform new worlds.

name: King's Gambit
description: King's Gambit is a Cooperative Dungeon Crawler Roguelite inspired by Chess! Every run offers a fresh strategic challenge as you build and customize your buffs and abilities card deck. Choose from several playable characters, weapons and spells and embark on a solo or co-op turn-based adventure!

name: Make Your Country Great Again
description: Here is a global multiplayer clicker/idle game where players from all over the world unite for a chance to restore global justice and make their country the greatest among all others. There has never been a game this global and massive!

name: Incredifall
description: We aim to make the most Entertaining and Exhilarating game possible! Incredifall! Also, offer CASH PRIZES in the future!! :D 60 Challenging Levels at the moment and there will be 200 levels offering hours of entertainment! Are you excited as we are to play this amazing original game? Play now!

name: Library of Lyria
description: Take care of the magical Library Of Lyria. Renovate the old building from a ruin into a wonderful, enchanted place that you fill with new life. Create or find new books, explore the world and take care of your customers. Will you help restore the Library of Lyria to its former glory?

name: Skidrush
description: Fast and Furious in the City! Look out for skidrush! Win rewards by carrying out missions and collaborating with other players. Get a variety of vehicles, from sports cars to special vehicles Build your own vehicle.

name: Sliding Hero
description: Sliding Hero is a top-down puzzle Metroidvania where you slide in a single direction until hitting an obstacle. Trapped in a sinister 1700s Venetian villa, explore a world inspired by Venice’s carnival that will test your wits to overcome challenges, uncover secrets, and unmask your destiny.

name: HopHop Fox
description: Hop Hop Fox is a fun puzzle game for adults and kids! Enjoy fun and stimulating puzzle gameplay, play through the offline puzzle sets, and create your own to share online!

name: Royal Quest Online
description: Fantasy comes alive in this vast yet cozy free-to-play MMORPG! Choose between 4 classes and 8 subclasses, explore hundreds of locations, thousands of quests, dive into varied PvE and PvP modes, enter the unique vibrant world, and trade with other players. Play, explore, fight and be victorious!

name: Tanks of Freedom II
description: A turn-based strategy with up to four armies fighting against each other. Challenge yourself in a campaign against AI, or a hot-seat battle with a friend. Follow the story of Prince Tybalt and restore peace in the Amber Noon kingdom.

name: Voidstorm
description: Voidstorm is an on-rails shooter in space with twin stick controls. Fight epic space battles against fleets of enemies, engage and destroy capital ships, evade through narrow passages and save the federation together with your wingmates.

name: Wizard of Wings
description: A puzzle-adventure escape game. Solve clever puzzles set within stunning 3D graphics, exploring well-crafted environments to uncover hidden clues and useful objects. Experience the thrill of freeing the birds and advancing through this mesmerizing journey.

name: Tapeheads
description: Tapeheads is an atmospheric retro-futuristic simulation. Use a one-of-a-kind computer and its programming language to solve puzzles, and play mini-games.

name: After Story: Witch Dragon
description: High difficulty bullet-hell 2D scrolling action game

name: Sigil of Chaos
description: Dive deep into the storyline, break through the hordes of enemies, collect rare loot, and try to resist your temptations… or, alternately, head to the arena and face off against other players. The Sigil of Chaos awaits its keeper.

name: Backroom Company
description: Backroom Company studies 'Noclip,' a supernatural phenomenon creating randomly linked backrooms. Its founders and purpose are unknown. Many explorers hired have disappeared in backrooms. Players trace past expeditions, farming unique items. Goal: deliver them to the main control room's dumbwaiter.

name: Fishing Tale
description: Fishing Tale is a relaxing fishing adventure game where you catch over 40 unique fish across diverse environments like oceans, lakes, and rivers. Customize your character, track your catches in a detailed journal, and enjoy the soothing sounds of nature.

name: Trifecta
description: An arcade match-3 game about combining triangles! Play the default mode to hone your skills, compete for the highest score in dailies, and create custom game modes to share with friends!

name: God of Fortune
description: Every time we tap in the virtual world, a string of numbers full of hope and wealth will follow. Every click in the virtual world is a challenge and breakthrough in real life. Every click is a knock on the soul; every God of Wealth Coin is hope for the future.

name: Flowence
description: Flowence is an immersive virtual world where you can freely express your feelings, share your thoughts, manage daily tasks and more. It is the first social game to reasonably utilize AI technology.

name: The Territory of Egg 2
description: The Territory of Egg 2 is an unique tower defense indie game. Place Egg Towers, choose evolution branches, combine skills and build defenses. The souls of Heroic Eggs await your awakening! Explore and gather resources in the dark forest, unlock the technology tree, and defeat even stronger enemies!

name: Momentum Mayhem
description: A casual 2.5D physics oriented game about building unorthodox contraptions to solve puzzles with a variety of items at disposal

name: Fantasy Valley: Season 1
description: Fantasy Valley is a visual novel. The player have choice to talk with characters, and explore objects. The story is linear with moments of exploration sprinkled in. Occasional dialogue options give player a chance to express their personality but these choices will not affect how the story pans out.

name: I Am The Registered Environmental Engineer
description: This world is plagued by pollution, and as an engineer, you need to plan waste routes, gather, sort, and transport it to safe areas. Use powerful equipment to finally clean it up and restore cleanliness to the world.

name: Blood Punk
description: Blood Punk is a hyper violent fast-paced retro FPS where you must exchange your health for bullets. Eviscerate giant abominations with the blood of an angel using deadly weapons in a dark fantasy comic book world.

name: Young Detectives: Undersea
description: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Footprints Combination
description: An action puzzle game in which you have to pile up footprints to make them bigger. Aim for a high score so that you don't fall off the platform.

name: Kajun's Lucid Room
description: A little collection of mini-games with Kajun-chan. You get an up-close and personal look at Kajun-chan's daily routine in this unique sandbox module from changing clothes, photo shooting with custom posing & dancing and even help Kajun-chan shower !

name: Lucky Farm
description: On this tranquil island, you will manage your own farm. Grow crops, build facilities, and sell products to earn rent and drive farm growth. Accumulate wealth to purchase permanent land use rights and become the true owner of the farm.

name: Dungeon Mercenaries
description: Dungeon Mercenaries is an endless replayability RPG. Every time you wake up, it's a new start, procedurally generated map, randomly generated characters,explore the dungeon with different mercenaries, get reasure chests, gold coins, mercenaries, potions, food, and glory!

name: Icarus M: Guild War
description: A PC game ready to take you into fresh levels of adventure and exploration.

name: Recall
description: This game plunges you into a challenging universe set against a cosmic backdrop,

name: Astrostrike
description: You are the captain of the Galactic battleship, building hundreds of gun turrets, raising dozens of space fighters, establishing aircraft carrier groups, space stations, and conquering the entire Milky Way

name: VR Shogi Mates
description: Dive into the immersive world of board games with VRShogiMates! Play Shogi, Chu Shogi, Chess, Xiangqi, and Gungi in a virtual environment. Challenge friends in real-time or turn-based multiplayer. Learn the rules, while enjoying regular updates for an ever-evolving gaming experience.

name: Crown and Adventure
description: An open-world adventure RPG game. Choose your favorite character, train your elite legion step by step, and crash all enemies on the battlefield. Strengthen yourself, establish a powerful family, create a great dynasty, and become the dominator of this fantasy world.

name: Cult Land
description: Summon dozens of spirits in the poker game, play a straight flush, and slash the evil spirits!

name: Ad Memoriam
description: Ad Memoriam is a mystery game about a band with a curse: at every single one of their concerts, someone dies of an accident. Follow the band and the trail of bodies that they leave behind, reconstruct each accident from witness testimony, and unravel the truth behind Ad Memoriam and it's curse.

name: Nuts
description: Nuts is the next Strand Type enviroment with a clicker experience, in which you click things! In Nuts you tap the nut to gain even more nuts! Every 2 and 17 hours, you get dropped some nuts. Each nut is made by the community in discord.

description: Sin descripción

name: Madagascar Kartz
description: Sin descripción

description: The PC version has differences in the modes that there are, in addition to an exclusive feature with the credits that the PlayStation version doesn’t have.

name: Manall's FF1
description: Sin descripción

name: Garbagefield Saves Christmas
description: Sin descripción

name: Doki Doki Literature Club
description: An unofficial port for the PSP.

name: Episode 2: The 4 Seasons of Quake #2
description: Episode 2: The 4 Seasons of Quake #2 features 9 SP maps made by CZG, Hrimfaxi, Leviathan, Moz, Pulsar, RPG, Scampie, and Xenon

name: Picassio
description: A non-violent stealth / thief game which was in development by Promethean Designs, and would’ve been about an art thief. The game was scrapped due to the developers entering bankruptcy and being unable to find a publisher.

name: Distance: Console Edition
description: Melding the intensity of arcade racing with the agility of parkour, Distance catapults you into a neon-soaked world shrouded in mystery. Adapt quickly using your car’s abilities to jump, flip, and fly to overcome deadly hazards and survive.

name: The Demon Blade
description: Welcome to The Demon Blade. Fight your way through forest, small villages, catacombs and dungeons to find the LEGENDARY DEMON BLADE, a powerful weapon that can slay any demon in it's wake. Using the awesome Supercharge by @Tango.

name: Backpack Brawl
description:
Explore the immersive world of Backpack Brawl - a dynamic inventory management 2D auto-battle strategy game.

Unleash your strategic prowess as you purchase and craft potent items to achieve success in the game. Keep the momentum going by growing your inventory, expand your backpack capacity, and adapt to any challenges that lie ahead.

Placement matters! Putting the right items next to each other makes all the difference. Play smart and you'll do well.

Play against other players. You play against other players who have had the same opportunities as you. See what they come up with, and counter them! You might even learn some new tricks looking at what they do.

Choose between multiple Heroes to help shape your available items and inventory and choose the direction you like! Are you a spell-slinging elementalist? A hardy warrior? A long range marksman? As more heroes join the Brawl, the heroes you meet only get more challenging.

Fight your way to the top of the rankings!

name: Leap On!
description:
Experience one touch arcade gaming at its finest.

Touch and hold to swing around the centre while avoiding the black shapes. Grab power ups and enjoy causing chaos while getting the highest score you can. Leap, live and have fun!

name: Slender: Last Sleep
description:
Slender a terrible walker on the monster called stick insects (Slender Man), who kidnaps people around the world!

He is tall and very thin, always wears a black suit with white shirt and tie. His arms were bent at any point, have no joints and can be extended. He has no face. Slenderman is waiting for you!

name: GTA Long Night
description: GTA: Long Night is an arcade horror modification for Vice City, developed by The Fighting Hellfish. After over a year of development, this mod transforms the familiar setting of Vice City into a city besieged by hordes of the undead. The storyline focuses on multiple survivors making their way to the last human stronghold, sharing tales of zombie chaos through over twenty original missions and cutscenes. The mod features new radio stations, particle effects, animations, and more than half a dozen playable characters.

name: Chunithm Luminous Plus
description: An expanded version of Chunithm Luminous.

name: Maimai DX Buddies Plus
description:
Maimai DX Buddies Plus is an upgraded version of Maimai DX Buddies for arcade.

General Information / Changes
maimile shop & Weekly Mission introduced. Completing Weekly Missions will reward you maimile, which can be used for items in the maimile shop.
- This makes maimai BUDDiES PLUS the first game in the series to use the maimile currency since ORANGE PLUS.
- maimile shop can be used inside maimaiでらっくすNET.

New progress tickets introduced that can be purchased at the maimile shop:
- Weekly Area progress 2x ticket (ウィークリーちほー進行2倍チケット), which doubles the distance multiplier on the Area. Only one ticket can be purchased/owned a week.
- Tour Member level up 5x ticket (つあメンレベルアップ5倍チケット), which quintuples the level up rate of tour members.

Favorites can now be chosen for songs on the song results screen by pressing a button. Up to 30 songs can be added.
- This function can only be used on songs you have unlocked.

Album page now shows the location where the picture is taken, a save button, and also a disclaimer of the photo.

Favorite and random selection functions have been added to Collections. Up to 30 of each type of Collection item can be saved as favorites.

When playing with someone who's not your friend on the same cabinet, a friend registration screen will be displayed after the name entry screen. If you select "yes", you will instantly become friends. This feature on the website is called friends on the spot (その場でフレンド).
- This will not display if either player has set their settings to skip friend registration.

When performing a rating color change effect, the effect screen will be retained until a certain amount of time passes, or until the "Skip" button is pressed.

By touching the rival score display area, you can temporarily hide your rival's score.

English notation added to various UI.

name: Pokémon Corogarena
description: Pokémon Corogarena is a Japanese exclusive arcade game medal game by Sega.

description: An arcade puzzle game with a fireworks theme. Use a slot machine to select your coloured bombs to drop into your playing area, when match a figure with the correct group of coloured bombs to set off a combo to score points.

description: An anime style Mahjong game for the arcades, a spin off of the Super Real Mahjong Series

description: Fly frantically between fast-approaching obstacles by typing classic poems! Put your skills of both typing and timing to the test in this new spin on an old favorite! Prefer to fly casual? Try relaxed mode instead and take in the beauty of balladry!

name: DC: Batman Bat-Tech Edition
description: The ultimate augmented reality Batman mobile experience, featuring Bat-Tech STEM-inspired stories, mini-games, stickers, and more. Travel through Gotham City in a way that’s never been done before - augmented reality. Learn how to use Batman’s unique technology, take on challenges against Batman’s most evil adversaries, and play Batman versions of fan favorite mobile games.

name: Sour Music Kart
description: Sin descripción

name: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
description: Sin descripción

name: Blok Shot VR
description:
Embark on an interstellar journey with Block Shot VR, where the cosmos is your playground and every shot counts. Dive into a visually mesmerizing universe, complete with vibrant planets, pulsating audio, and challenging block adversaries that stand in your way. See you on the leaderboard! ​

Highlights of Block Shot VR:

​Dynamic Shooting: Challenge your reflexes and accuracy as you target and blow-up floating blocks and bombs.​Time-Based Challenges: With the clock ticking, every second matters. Strategize your shots, earn points, and strive for the highest score before time runs out. The Armory Awaits: After each victorious round, venture to the Store and use points to buy more lives and better weapons! ​Audio Emission: Vibe with the music and the blocks oscillating, vibrant colors Leaderboards: Compete against players worldwide and see how your skills stack up on the global leaderboards. Regular Updates:

name: Helldivers 2: Escalation of Freedom
description: Escalation of Freedom is the first major update for Helldivers 2. Get ready to take on the new "Super-Helldive" CR10 difficulty, deadly new enemies, new mission types and much more.

name: Tiny Kingdom
