Build your kingdom and shape your destiny in the enchanting world of Greenhaven.

name: Spritz the Happy Onion
description: Spritz needs to bake a cake to ruin the appetite of the monster who's come to eat the moon! Guide Spritz the Happy Onion as he jumps off of background elements and into your heart. A delightful, surreal throwback to momentum-based platformers of old.

name: Story of a Hunter
description: Incarnate an adventurer in the small town of Voran. Meet the citizens, personalize your house, play minigames and write your own story in this turn based RPG dungeon crawler.

name: Skyline Savior
description: Control Sam’s car in Skyline Savior with arcadey movement, jumping, dashing, slow motion, and downforce skills. Conquer obstacles in regular, pretty hard, and impossible modes for the ultimate challenge.

name: The Golden Light Guardian
description: Save The Mysterious Island! Craft tools, gather resources, and build defenses on a mysterious island. By day, explore and hunt. By night, fight off undead hordes to protect the island's light!

name: Dark Symphony
description: Dark Symphony is a music-based single-player horror game involving a madman's obsession with cult classic "Lincolnshire Posy." Find all six records lost during the man's drunken slumber, or risk the murder of your wife. Exit the cabin if you dare.

name: The Rocket Man
description: Have you ever thought what it would be like to have a superpower?

name: Tales of Frah'Akin
description: Tales of Frah’Akin is an upcoming story-based fantasy RPG, in the style of the old classics but with a modern touch, rich with cinematic cutscenes.

name: Hard Parking
description: How well do you think you can drive a car?

name: Jab Juggernauts
description: Step into the ring with our exhilarating boxing game! Bringing every punch and knockout to life. Master your skills, earn achievements, and rise to the top. Whether you're a casual gamer or a boxing enthusiast, this game promises action-packed fun and endless challenges!

name: Masterchef Cakes Edition 2
description: "Masterchef Cakes Edition 2" is a fun and engaging cooking game that focuses on the process of making cakes from start to finish.

name: The Legend of Piss Boy 2
description: A retro action platformer! Play as Piss Boy or King Krow and try to defeat the Time Wizard!

name: Fabergegg
description: Fabergegg - the ultimate clicker game! Every 3 hours, get chests or keys with unique items. Unlock chests for rare Faberge eggs. All items have properties and rarity, and are tradable.

name: Whisper of the Swallows
description: Sink into a vast, strange and unforgiving world, in procedural generation. Fight against extreme climatic conditions. Alone or in cooperation, survive, explore, build and bring light back to the chaos.

name: Umigame
description: Umigame is an explosive roguelite multiplayer adventure. Defeat challenging enemies. Protect and strategically use the Egg, a powerful artifact essential for victory. Unlock unique characters, builds, and strategies in every session.

name: Salvation: Immortale
description: The fog city detective with exceptional intelligence and keen insight, Mei Qu, one day encounters a snow country girl with snow-colored long hair and witch-like beauty, Snell, at a crime scene. From this moment, their fates begin to intertwine, and an adventurous story unfolds.

name: Memories Not Found
description: Travel through surreal worlds and make new friends while trying to unravel the secrets of your past…

name: The Legacy
description: Cooperative survival and horror genre. You and your family have returned to your native land, on which a terrible curse and darkness has fallen. Will you be able to survive in a harsh and dangerous environment and stop the evil? It depends only on you, on your skills and ability to help each other.

name: Orcdom
description: A traditional tower defense blend of popular elements, placing buildings and casting spells at just the right time to resist the onslaught of orc hordes.

name: JumpMap
description: JumpMap is an exciting first-person 3D platformer that features a special mechanic: every time you fall, you get put back to where you were before. Explore 20+ carefully designed levels that challenge your skills. Now with Speedrun Mode: race through all levels and track your best times!

name: Welcome to Dustown
description: Welcome to Dustown is a 4-player cooperative horror game. Play as field scientists exploring vast fields of labyrinthine corn, collecting samples and evidence on behalf of a mysterious corporation. Just make sure you don't get killed at the crossroads.

name: Paris in 2000 Years
description: 'Paris in 2000 Years' is a city-builder game focused on the history of Paris. From the Gallo-Roman era to the Middle Ages and the Renaissance, you can construct, upgrade, and beautify various buildings. Completing historical quests will also reward you with iconic landmark architectures.

name: The Stalked 2
description: "The Stalked 2" is a standalone horror sequel to "The Stalked", where you play as Rachel, an avid hiker. What begins as a relaxing hike to a cabin turns into a nightmare filled with eerie interactions and unsettling events. Will you survive?

name: Truckful
description: Drive your pickup truck through seemingly peaceful countryside valleys, deliver much-needed goods to local townsfolk and unravel the small town mystery. Beware, the old forest is watching.

name: Norbert's Diary
description: Norbert's Diary is a retro-themed psychological horror game set in the 2000s. In it you will learn the story of Norbert, the guy who opened a gas station in the forest. You have to earn money and serve customers, but who knows what, or who, can kill you.

name: EgoVersus: The First Strike
description: A fast-paced sci-fi first person shooter. Classic fps multiplayer, zombie mode (coming soon), and battle royale mode (coming soon) with rich story, and unique characters. EgoVersus: The First Strike aims to bring the old school FPS experience back to the modern gaming industry.

name: Backrooms: The Labyrinth
description: Explore non-linear paths and evade lurking monsters as you uncover the mysteries of this eerie maze. Beware of the sinister entities that inhabit the shadows, ready to drag you deeper into the unknown.

name: Click Me: Hentai Adventure
description: Welcome to our exciting clicker game where you interact with charming characters! Choose from a variety of attractive girls, uncover their outfits, and experience different levels of nudity. Satisfy characters to add intrigue and diversity to gameplay.

name: Gamer Stories: Dating Real Japanese Female Gamers
description: This is a game where you can date real Japanese female gamers. Through dates, you can learn about each character's actual life experiences and hardships, getting to know them deeply. All of them share the common trait of being gamers, so you, who love games, will have lively conversations with them.

name: The Colony: New Haven Chronicles
description: New Haven is a utopia under a red moon, turned into a dystopian nightmare. You are a prisoner with no name, waking up in the middle of an emergency. Fight for survival guided by an enigmatic voice in your head, explore a falling world, solve puzzles, and unravel dark secrets.

name: HeartWare
description: Yours decisions matters, leading to multiple unique endings that reflect your influence on Iris’s fate.

name: The Lost Gallery
description: Works of art are attacking people, turning an exhibition into a bloodbath in a single night. At the same time, you – a phantom thief – happen to be there to steal a valuable masterpiece.

name: The Curse of Elmwood
description: You hear quiet whispers from deep inside the house, but no one sees. You begin to feel that you are not alone in this house. Curse of Elmwood is an atmospheric horror where you find yourself trapped in a gloomy 18th century mansion, steeped in mystery and horror.

name: Forgotten Bunker 1939
description: step into the boots of Private Jacob, an American soldier caught in the fury of a World War II bombing raid. Desperately seeking refuge, Jacob stumbles upon a terrifying mysterious bunker, which turns out to be a demonic time portal.

name: Royal Revolt Warriors
description: Thrilling 1-4 players co-op survivor gameplay combined with stunning graphics, where powerful Warriors battle through hordes of vicious enemies using a blend of melee and ranged weapons.

name: Frog Holm
description: Unexpectedly, you become the owner of a pub that has seen better days. During the day, set sail to explore a variety of new islands, each with its own unique treasures and ingredients for your cocktails. Can you restore the pub to its former glory? Dive into this charming adventure and find out!

name: Mini-Tank Arena
description: Mini Tank Arena is a 4v4 multiplayer battle Arena shooter, play on different maps experience the battle styles of each unique tank, and see how each tank can synergize with other tanks to help elevate the playing field.

name: Containment Breach
description: Containment Breach is a wave-based zombie survival game with a unique shooting mechanic. Earn points to unlock doors, buy and upgrade weapons, perks, and equipment. See how fast you can escape the facility or choose to stay and go for the highest round possible.

name: Master of Love
description: Single and unemployed, 33-year-old Jun-Ho finds himself transported back in time ten years. He takes the chance to romance five women from his past – and get it right this time. Unlock five unique endings in Master of Love, an FMV game that offers the ultimate K-drama experience.

name: Aotenjo: Infinite Hands
description: The Mahjong Roguelike. Aotenjo is an deckbuilder where you will use Mahjong styles all over the world to beat innate threats, play different Patterns and combos, reach the "bottom" of Aotenjo, and discover ancient secrets....

name: Morimens
description: Morimens is a roguelite card-building game inspired by the Cthulhu mythos, where you craft a versatile and intricate deck tailored to your playstyle. The choice is yours to embark on a climb up treacherous towers or engage in tactical battles. Explore misty maps and uncover the truth of the world.

name: Robabekya
description: You envision a futuristic scenario where humans coexist in an open world alongside robots disguised with human-like skins, equipped with dynamic and adaptive system where AI learns from previous engagements, adjusts tactics, and becomes increasingly proficient in combat scenarios.

name: South Words Hero
description: Explore a world where names are everything. Rip letters from your own name and use them as weapons, shields, and tools. Each name opens new possibilities.

name: Circle TD: Defence War
description: A tower defense game.In the wave after wave of enemy attacks like a tide, constantly configure defense tower ties, player talents, props and equipment, build a powerful defense position, and eliminate the enemy before they fill the map!

name: Inventory Quest: Hero's Hoard
description: Inventory Quest: Hero's Hoard is a short and fast-paced inventory management and loadout optimization game. The player must upkeep a hero's loadout from random item drops and try to survive as long as possible to achieve a new high score.

name: Hypno
description: Mind melting techno orgasm! Rhythm game based on DJing principles, music remixing techniques & VJing experience.

name: The Supper: New Blood
description: Do you hear the doorbell, Stewie? Your first guest is here...and something tells me they’ll never leave this motel...

name: Deeplands
description: Explore the Deeplands, an ancient underground world harboring the remnants of a lost civilization. Fight and parkour your way through destructible caves and dungeons, acquire mysterious powers and tools to grow stronger and recover the ancient dwarven crown in this open-cave roguelike platformer!

name: Only One Sword
description: Join the epic journey of a sword rising from dungeons to the surface. Defeat enemies, grow stronger, and return to your master because they need you!

name: Can't Revert
description: Can't revert is a first-person psychological horror game. You repeatedly find yourself in a house where your wife and son are dead. Discover hidden clues in the house and uncover the secrets of their deaths. Experience the constant tension and fear in the repetitive space.

name: Szikra
description: A relaxing, 2.5D side-scrolling short game set in a unique steampunk/fantasy environment. Find your way through vast fields, magical forests, and giant gears in a steaming factory to reach the twisted circus where your friend is locked up. Jump, find switches, push boxes around to get there.

name: Save
description: Save is a survival deep sea horror game for 1-4 online co-op game, sets in the eerie depths of an abandoned 6,000-Ton Ship 'SENARA', where every shadow holds a secret, and every corner could be your last. Unravel the mysteries and safely escape avoiding relentless threats that prowl in the darkness.

name: Logistics Tycoon Simulator
description: Start small, think big in “Logistics Tycoon.” Begin with a single vehicle and expand your freight empire across challenging terrains. Manage a fleet, tackle challenging deliveries, and optimize logistics to grow your business. Are you ready to become the ultimate logistics tycoon?

name: Clumsy Coffee Simulator
description: Brew, Spill, Repeat!Step into the chaos as a clumsy barista, crafting drinks and building your dream café. Customize your space, manage orders, and embrace the spills and fun in this engaging simulator.

name: Express Car Wash Simulator
description: Run your own Car Wash company! Wash cars, earn money, grow your business and enjoy the bubbles!

name: Cosmic Remnants
description: In Cosmic Remnants, you find yourself adrift in space with only a floating platform. Alone or with friends, survive by scavenging resources, upgrading your platform, and enhancing yourself with discovered body parts. Explore advanced bases and uncover the truth behind humanity's demise!

name: Twilight Tonics
description: Manage your own potion shop, concocting powerful elixirs that heal, deceive, and empower. Explore the dark fantasy world to collect mystical ingredients, and take on special orders to influence warring factions.

name: Sigma War Notes
description: This is an ACT action game that can achieve a satisfying sense of impact through simple operations.

name: Idol Party
description:
“WOW,you can really dance!” Welcome to IDOL PARTY. Immerse yourself in dance and song to find friends in this social game. Charm your love with moves and melodies, pledge togetherness, marry, and start a family. Tired? Farm or play mini-games for endless fun!

"Idol Party" is a music game with a lively style using the concept of idols!
Gorgeous costumes, personalized mounts, massive music songs, everything you want is here.

name: Guns are Funs
description: Guns are Funs is a fun and exciting arcade game for people of all ages. It will help develop coordination of movements, accuracy and logical thinking. You have to shoot from a toy cannon at towers made of cubes.

name: Before Exit: Supermarket
description: Before Exit: Supermarket combines features from roguelike with walking simulator. As Supermarket employee you clean up damaged items, wipe up stains, and turn off the lights. Your task is close the store behind you, hoping that all tasks have been completed.

name: Holiday Farm
description: A sandbox game that simulates life on a farm. Experience life, growing vegetables, raising animals, diving in mineral water on a happy island.

name: Try to Survive Today
description: A three-dimensional shooter with an isometric camera or a first- or third-person view. You in a fur suit shoot all sorts of devils and robots spawning from everywhere. By gaining experience for destroying enemies, collecting their souls, you upgrade your tree of characteristics

name: Anomalum
description: You’re trapped in an endless nightmare. Observe your surroundings carefully and check the clock to escape from Anomalum.

name: Hexeract
description: Roguelike deck-building game on hexagonal tiles. Enjoy a dopamine-boosting experience by maximizing the synergy of your deck and tiles.
